Calculate pooled arm statistics in Aggregated Data (AgD) based on arm-specific statistics

Source: R/process_data.R
complete_agd.Rd

This is a convenient function to pool arm statistics. This function is called within process_agd and when the ARM is not equal to "Total". Note pooled median can't be calculated and it is only an approximation.

Usage

complete_agd(use_agd)

Arguments

use_agd

aggregated data that is processed within process_agd

Value

Complete N, count, mean, sd, and median for the pooled arm
